entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
